description: OmegaT is a free translation memory application that works on Windows, macOS, Linux... It is a tool intended for professional translators. It does not translate for you! (Software that does this is called "machine translation", and you will have to look elsewhere for it.)
summary: OmegaT is a free translation memory application intended for professional translators
author: Aaron Madlon-Kay,  OmegaT Developers
